channel.title: Rob Lowe on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rob Lowe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Rob Lowe Returns to Filming in Los Angeles With ‘The Musical’ Opposite Gillian Jacobs and Will Brill
item.description: Lowe, who went viral for a fiery take on the challenges of filming projects in the city, is starring in and producing the independent dark comedy for director Giselle Bonilla and writer Alexander Hell

item.title: Rob Lowe Returns to Filming in Los Angeles With ‘The Musical’ Opposite Gillian Jacobs and Will Brill

item.title: Rob Lowe Lands New Brand Ambassador Gig
item.description: The appointment on behalf of premium hospitality experience provider On Location will see Lowe making rounds and serving as the face of the brand at events like the Super Bowl and FIFA World Cup 26.
